TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWin32Window

summary.span: Fornece uma interface para expor os identificadores do Win32 HWND.

span.span: Provides an interface to expose Win32 HWND handles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Essa interface é implementada em objetos que expõem os identificadores de HWND Win32.This interface is implemented on objects that expose Win32 HWND handles. O identificador resultante pode ser usado com as chamadas de API do Win32.The resultant handle can be used with Win32 API calls. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir define o propriedade `label1` ao atual de `Form1`.The following example sets the property of `label1` to the current of `Form1`. Este exemplo pressupõe que você tenha um chamado `Form1` com um chamado `label1` nele.This example assumes that you have a called `Form1` with a called `label1` on it. [!code-cpp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Handle As IntPtr
public: property IntPtr Handle { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: Obtém o identificador para a janela representada pelo implementador.

span.span: Gets the handle to the window represented by the implementer.

value.span: Um identificador para a janela representada pelo implementador.

span.span: A handle to the window represented by the implementer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Dependendo do implementador, o valor da propriedade pode ser alteradas durante a vida útil da janela.Depending on the implementer, the value of the property could change during the life of the window. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir define o propriedade `label1` ao atual de `Form1`.The following example sets the property of `label1` to the current of `Form1`. Este exemplo pressupõe que você tenha um chamado `Form1` com um chamado `label1` nele.This example assumes that you have a called `Form1` with a called `label1` on it. [!code-cpp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
